title: The peak of the business cycle

content.prompt: If an economy is at the peak of the business cycle, then which of the following is true about the state of the economy?

choices.label: The economy is producing at its potential output level.
The economy is producing below its potential output level.
The unemployment rate is higher than the natural rate of unemployment.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
